***** Newar[edit] *****
Newar Wikipedia has an article on:
इमा
Wikipedia_new
**** Etymology[edit] ****
From Classical_Newar 𑐫𑐸𑐩𑐵 (yumā). Cognate to Thangmi आमु.
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [ima]
**** Noun[edit] ****
इमा • (imā) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐂𑐩𑐵)
   1. eagle
***** Pali[edit] *****
**** Alternative forms[edit] ****
Alternative forms
    * imā (Latin script)
    * 𑀇𑀫𑀸 (Brahmi script)
    * ইমা (Bengali script)
    * ඉමා (Sinhalese script)
    * ဣမာ or ဢိမႃ (Burmese script)
    * อิมา (Thai script)
    * ᩍᨾᩣ (Tai Tham script)
    * ອິມາ (Lao script)
    * ឥមា (Khmer script)
    * 𑄃𑄨𑄟𑄂 (Chakma script)
**** Adjective[edit] ****
इमा (imā)
   1. Devanagari_script form of imā, which is nom/acc plural feminine of इम
      (ima, “this”)
**** Pronoun[edit] ****
इमा f
   1. Devanagari_script form of imā (“this one”)
